Name: Percentage of cases where 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' is immediately followed by 'SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion'
Metric: Percentage of 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' out of all 'SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion'

Name: Frequency of 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' across all cases in the event log
Metric: Number of 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' activities

Name: Percentage of 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' occurrences that are part of variants leading to 'SW-EIC Reject'
Metric: Percentage of 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' out of all 'SW-EIC Reject'

Name: Number of times 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' appears before any reviewer-related activity (e.g., 'SW-Reviewer Agreed', 'SW-Reviewer Declined', or 'SW-Reviewer No Response')
Metric: Number of 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' activities for cases where activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' occurs

Name: Percentage of process variants that start with 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' compared to those that start with 'SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion'
Metric: Percentage of 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' out of all 'SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion'

Name: Frequency of 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' in cases that eventually include 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'
Metric: Number of 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' activities for cases where activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' occurs

Name: Percentage of 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' events that are followed within 24 hours by 'Manuscript Export Succeeded'
Metric: Percentage of 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' out of all 'Manuscript Export Succeeded'

Name: Ratio of 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' to 'Revised Manuscript Submission Confirmation' across the entire log
Metric: Percentage of 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' out of all 'Revised Manuscript Submission Confirmation'

Name: Number of variants in which 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' occurs more than once
Metric: Number of 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' activities

Name: Percentage of cases containing 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' that proceed to at least one instance of 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'
Metric: Percentage of 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' out of all 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Frequency of 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' in cases that end with an acceptance decision (e.g., 'SW-EIC Accept' or 'RW-EIC Accept')
Metric: Number of 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' activities for cases where activity 'SW-EIC Accept' occurs

Name: Percentage of 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' that occur in the initial phase of a case (i.e., as one of the first three activities)
Metric: Percentage of 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' out of all cases

Name: Number of times 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' is directly followed by a plagiarism-related activity ('Plagiarism Originality Report Completed' or 'Plagiarism Percent Match Threshold Exceeded')
Metric: Number of 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' activities for cases where activity 'Plagiarism Originality Report Completed' occurs

Name: Percentage of cases where 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' is not followed by any checklist-related activity (e.g., 'SW-Checklist Completed' or 'SW-Checklist Completion is due in three days')
Metric: Percentage of 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' out of all cases where 'SW-Checklist Completed' does not happen

Name: Frequency of 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' in comparison to the total number of system-generated confirmation activities (including 'Revised Manuscript Submission Confirmation', 'Resubmission Manuscript Submission Confirmation', and 'First Look Manuscript Submission Confirmation')
Metric: Number of 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' activities for cases where activity 'Revised Manuscript Submission Confirmation' occurs
